name: uuidv3_generator
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool uuid_generator.
Tool description: UUID generator
API description: Generates a UUIDv3 based on the provided namespace and name using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

namespace.description: The namespace to use for generating the UUIDv3. Allowed values are 'dns', 'url', 'oid', 'x500', and 'nil'.

name.description: The name to use for generating the UUIDv3.
